initial_state: The user is logged into the 4ga Boards application, has opened the card view for a specific card, and is viewing the card's details.
steps: Locate the 'Add attachments' button within the card view.
Select the file(s) to attach from the local system.
Confirm the addition of the attachment(s).
expected_state: The selected file(s) are attached to the card, visible within the card's attachment section.
